channel.title: poster on QCrypt 2022
channel.description: Recent content in poster on QCrypt 2022

item.title: Poster Session 1
item.description: This poster session takes place on Tue, 30 Aug, 10:15 - 12:15 online instructions for authors of accepted posters Download a zip-archive of all posters. -- Posters presented in this session Fiat-Shamir for Proofs Lacks a Proof Even in the Presence of Shared Entanglement Frédéric Dupuis ; Philippe Lamontagne ; Louis Salvail Quantum Differential Privacy: An Information Theory Perspective Christoph Hirche ; Cambyse Rouze ; Daniel Stilck França Quantum Cryptography for Quantum Metrology Nathan Shettell ; Damian Markham Concentration inequality for security analysis of finite-size QKD Go Kato Improvement in quantum communication using quantum switch Arindam Mitra ; Himanshu Badhani ; Sibasish Ghosh Improving the Security of "Measurement-Device-Independent Quantum Communication without Encryption" Nayana Das ; Goutam Paul Commitment capacity of classical-quantum channels Naqueb Ahmad Warsi ; Masahito Hayashi MIMO Terahertz Continuous Variable Quantum Key Distribution Neel Kanth Kundu ; Soumya P.

item.title: Poster Session 2
item.description: This poster session takes place on Wed, 31 Aug, 16:45 - 18:45 online. instructions for authors of accepted posters Download a zip-archive of all posters. -- Posters presented in this session Optimum ratio between two bases in Bennett-Brassard 1984 protocol with second order analysis Masahito Hayashi Uncloneable Decryptors from Quantum Copy-Protection Shai Wyborski ; Or Sattath Secure Anonymous Conferencing in Quantum Networks Federico Grasselli ; Gláucia Murta ; Jarn de Jong ; Frederik Hahn ; Dagmar Bruss ; Hermann Kampermann ; Anna Pappa Modulation leakage-free continuous-variable quantum key distribution Adnan Hajomer ; Nitin Jain ; Hossein Mani ; Hou-Man Chin ; Ulrik L.

item.title: Poster Session 3 (In-person)
item.description: This poster session takes place on Thu, 1 Sep, 18:00 - 19:00 in-person only. instructions for authors of accepted posters Download a zip-archive of all posters. -- Posters presented in this session Quantum Cryptography for Quantum Metrology Nathan Shettell ; Damian Markham Distributing Polarization Entangled Photon Pairs with High Rate over Long Distance through Standard Telecommunication Fiber Lijiong Shen ; Chang Hoong Chow ; Justin Yu Xiang Peh ; Xi Jie Yeo ; Peng Kian Tan ; Christian Kurtsiefer Countering detector manipulation attacks in quantum communication through detector self-testing Lijiong Shen ; Christian Kurtsiefer Non-malleable Commitments against Quantum Attacks Nir Bitansky ; Huijia Lin ; Omri Shmueli Semi-Quantum Tokenized Signatures Omri Shmueli Creation of loopholes in QKD systems using high-power pulsed laser Daria Ruzhitskaya ; Irina Zhluktova ; Mikhail Petrov ; Konstantin Zaitsev ; Polina Acheva ; Nikolay Zunikov ; Alexey Shilko ; Djeylan Aktas ; Daniil Trefilov ; Anastasiya Ponosova ; Vladimir Kamynin ; Vadim Makarov Provably secure receiver-device-independent quantum key distribution Wen Yu Kon ; Ignatius W.
